origin.ifoe_bravers.patricia.name: Patricia
origin.ifoe_bravers.patricia.description:
An ice warrior who manipulates the power of winter. Specialized in cold climate combat, but vulnerable to heat.

§9Characteristics:§r
• Master of ice abilities
• Enhanced through growth system
• Thrives in cold biomes

§cWarning:§r Vulnerable to fire and heat
power.ifoe_bravers.ice_resistance.name: Unwavering Winter
power.ifoe_bravers.ice_resistance.descri: Immune to attack speed reduction and gains power in cold biomes.
power.ifoe_bravers.fire_weakness.name: Heat Vulnerability
power.ifoe_bravers.fire_weakness.descrip: Takes increased damage from fire and heat sources.
power.ifoe_bravers.ice_bloom.name: Ice Bloom
power.ifoe_bravers.ice_bloom.description: Creates three ice blooms that deal damage based on attack power.
power.ifoe_bravers.frost_field.name: Frost Field
power.ifoe_bravers.frost_field.descripti: Creates a frost field that buffs allies and debuffs enemies.
power.ifoe_bravers.spreading_frost.name: Spreading Frost
power.ifoe_bravers.spreading_frost.descr: Releases expanding frost waves that slow enemies.
layer.origins.patricia.name: Patricia Origins
